member.name: M:Czf.ApiWrapper.Radiocom.IRadiocomClient.StationRecentlyPlayed(System.Int32,System.Int32,Czf.ApiWrapper.Radiocom.DayOfWeek)
member.summary: Retrieve recently played information for a specific station.
member.param: the hour of the station converted from its local time to UTC
the day of the week for the station using it local time
member.example: wednesday at 10pm in pacific daylight time would use dayOfWeek = 3 and go offset seven hours so hour = 5
